pages.text: For items, cobalt is typically the 'better-than-iron-but-not-diamond' resource. But it also has uses in decoration.$(br2)Along with the ores themselves, you can craft raw cobalt and normal cobalt blocks.
$(o)Cobalt ore can be found occasionally underground above deepslate layers.
$(o)Deepslate cobalt ore can be found relatively commonly under deepslate layers.
